00030 #include "KDChartSignalCompressor.h"
00031 
00032 using namespace KDChart;
00033 
00034 SignalCompressor::SignalCompressor( QObject* receiver, const char* signal,
00035                                     QObject* parent )
00036     : QObject( parent )
00037 {
00038     connect( this, SIGNAL( finallyEmit() ), receiver, signal );
00039     connect( &m_timer, SIGNAL( timeout() ), SLOT( nowGoAlready() ) );
00040     m_timer.setSingleShot( true );
00041     // m_timer.setIntervall( 0 ); // default, just to know...
00042 }
00043 
00044 void SignalCompressor::emitSignal()
00045 {
00046     if ( !m_timer.isActive() ) m_timer.start();
00047 }
00048 
00049 void SignalCompressor::nowGoAlready()
00050 {
00051     emit finallyEmit();
00052 }
